verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: tweeted] [ARG1: the news that Kudlow , 70 , was at Walter Reed National Military Medical Center while on his way to meet Kim Jong Un in Singapore] .

President Donald Trump tweeted the news that [ARG0: Kudlow , 70] , was at Walter Reed National Military Medical Center while [ARGM-ADV: on his way] to [V: meet] [ARG1: Kim Jong Un] [ARGM-LOC: in Singapore] .
